attributes.action: Show our support to prevent any further migrants being allowed into the UK
attributes.background: With so many do gooders raising the question about the UK doing more to put pressure on Government to allow more migrants in. This is to show your support to show that there are a great number who don't want to allow any more migrants into the Country and to strengthen our UK borders

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107142

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
